name: WGCNA
description: Performs weighted correlation network analysis on a normalized expression matrix. Note that this does analysis does not look for differences between experimental groups. Rather, it attempts to infer groups of genes based on patterns of co-expression. Outputs from this analysis can then be tested for biological enrichment by using a GO analysis, for example.

expression.description: A table/matrix of normalized gene expression. Note that we cannot check that this table is normalized!
expression.name: Expressions:
